Course_Name: SoSe 24 ODS Das AMOS Projekt Product Owner Role

Messages.Author: Theofanis Vassiliou-Gioles
Messages.Content: ACTION REQUIRED: Course Entry survey Hello,  a big thank you to all of you, who participated at todays project pitches. I think we have great projects in the pipeline.  So, the next mandatory step for you is now to fill out the the course entry survey and indicate at which projects you could/want/doesn't want to participate.  You will find the survey here: https://forms.gle/qzpgkkkLscqVVhbx8 Please note: You have to fill out the survey. If you do not participate with the survey, you can't get a seat in AMOS. But please note further. that only because you participate at the survey a seat is not guaranteed.  You will be informed before the first lecture, whether a seat could be offered.  I'll hope to see you in the project. Best regards, Theo Vassiliou  PS: Please appologize if you receive multiple messages. In this case you have reqistered to more than one AMOS module on ISIS for this semester.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: ACTION REQUIRED: Presentation of industry projects and course entry survey

Messages.Author: Theofanis Vassiliou-Gioles
Messages.Content: Dear students: Thank you for your interest in the AMOS Project https://uni1.de/amos Next week on Wed April 10, our industry partners will pitch their projects. You can also find the project descriptions through the course organization doc at https://amos.uni1.de You have to take the course entry survey to declare your interest in projects so that we can assign you to project teams. You can find the course entry survey in the course organization doc. We recommend you listen in on the industry partner pitches though, on Wednesday. The pitches will take place in the usual AMOS classroom, see the Zoom link in the course org doc. See you on Wednesday! Dirk

Forums.Forum_name: Questions for AMOS Product Owner Role / Allgemeines Frage-Forum zu AMOS Product Owner Role

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Question related to students that were accepted: Is registration to MTS / MOSES also necessary?

Messages.Author: Georgios Karategos
Messages.Content: Dear AMOS team,  At the MOSES / MTS platform I can see the following regarding the registration of this course:  AMOS - Product Owner Role - Portfolioprüfung (6 LP) 04/17/2024, 10:00 AM - 05/31/2024, 11:59:59 PM Do TUB students that have been accepted at the AMOS-PO module, need to additionally register the module through the MTS / MOSES?  Thank you in advance for your answer.  Cheers George

Messages.Author: Navyug Singh
Messages.Content: Hello, I have a question which will be hopefully answered. Students who have not got a place in this semester, will they be certainly considered for the next semester if they apply again especially also if the next semester will be their last one?   Appreciate your answer.  Kind regards

Messages.Author: Theofanis Vassiliou-Gioles
Messages.Content: Hello,  sorry, there is no guarantee for a seat in a following semester.  The projects, the requirements, the backgrounds and the wishes are so divers across the semesters, that there can not be any guarantee. With best regards, Theo Vassiliou

Messages.Author: Fatih Kemal Tekin
Messages.Content: Hello, I discovered that that the survey necessary for securing a seat in this course is already closed. As I couldn't find the module initially on April 1st. I just searched it up again now. Is it still possible to participate in the survey? I am very interested in joining the course. Thank you for your assistance. Best regards, Fatih

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Next steps for enrollement before the partner presentations of April 10th

Messages.Author: Georgios Karategos
Messages.Content: Dear AMOS team,  I am not sure how to further proceed in declaring my interest for the course other than enrolling myself in this course on the TUB ISIS moodle instance.  In your first ISIS announcement you mentioned about a course entry survey and that it can be found in the project organisation document.  Does this mean that: - there will be a new tab added to the google sheet ( https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1103O1WLW8HLqIrjXs-KdT1fYf0e-IdrHH1hk2uRjTCA/edit#gid=6_ ) - or a link added at the index tab of that sheet - or will be a survey added at the UNI1 moodle instance [ https://myc.uni1.de ] - or maybe something else?  Is there any "early-bird" advantage when it comes to our acceptance in the course if we fill the survey before the partner presentations on April 10th or the time rank of students filling the form plays no role in the selection?  I suppose the details are about to be explained further on April 10th, I just want to make sure I do not miss some step before that date.  Thank you in advance for your answers.  Best George

Messages.Author: Georgios Karategos
Messages.Content: I just saw that a link was added to the spreadsheet and from what I understand from the questions I went through in the form, the timing of the answers seems to not be a factor for us being selected.  I suppose the deadline for filling in the survey with our project rankings will be made clear on Wednesday.

Messages.Author: Theofanis Vassiliou-Gioles
Messages.Content: Hello, I guess you participate at the pre-lecture this Wednesday and I hope that all your questions have been answered.  With best regards, Theo Vassiliou

Messages.Author: Navyug Singh
Messages.Content: Hello, there is something unclear in the document file.  It says for the question: Which role would you like to play?* Product owner (AMOS-PO, only Univ. Erlangen)  So does this really mean that only students from Erlangen can participate as a product owner? It seems to me like a mistake because I dont really know what the reason would be   providing this module here.  Maybe I have gotten something wrong.   Appreciate your answer.

Messages.Author: Theofanis Vassiliou-Gioles
Messages.Content: No, I think we have changed this by now. Also students from TU can apply for the PO role.  Best regards, Theo Vassiliou
